$$NOTE01.text:
Subject:  File 909 attached
From:     Glenn Siegel <glennsiegel@optonline.net>
Date:     4/23/2014 11:15 AM
To:       'Sam Golob' <sbgolob@cbttape.org>

Hi Sam,
I hope someone has a use for this.  I wrote this because one of
my clients was using a very old product called Doc View from CA.
They were unable to install Doc View under Windows 7, which needed
to be rolled out, since XP is no longer supported.  The choices CA
gave them were to buy Web view or CA-Spool.  Both products were a
bit pricey so I came up with this solution for them.

Hope all is well.

Glenn Siegel
GlennSiegel@optonline.net

$EXPLAIN.text:
How GSMAIL works:

1. Dispatch user exit RDFGEX04 performs the following:
   Takes the destination and email address from each of Dispatch's reports
   with an output class of E and places a message on the console like this:

   GSMAIL1I Report destid   will be emailed to somebody@someplace.com

   Then adds a line to the end of the report with the email address and
   reportid like this:

   EMAIL address = somebody@someplace.com           reportid


2. MPFXTALL retrieves message GSMAIL1I and issues a command on the
   console with the reports destid to start job BUILDWTR like this:
   S BUILDWTR,P=destid

3. BUILDWTR proc executes program BUILDIT that builds and submits JCL for a
   batch job with the jobname of the destid.

4. The destid batch job does the following:
   Step 1 deletes any old destid report dataset if it exists.
   Step 2 creates a dataset containing the report for that DESTID using the XWTR
          program IASXWR00. MPFXTALL assists in setting up and stopping the XWTR
          when the report has been written to the dataset.
          Dataset name is SYSP.DISP.RPT.destid so you may want to define an
          alias of SYSP or change the HLQ in all the programs and proc.
   Step 3 MAILIT program builds and submits JCL for a batch job called MAILIT
          using the email address and reportid added to the bottom of the of the
          report from exit RDFGEX04.

5. MAILIT emails the report using program XMITIP.

$INSTALL.text:
1. Read $XMITIC for a quick setup of XMITIP, see $INSTALL in MPFXTALL dataset.

2. Copy member BUILDWTR into any PROCLIB.

3. Change the SYSLMOD dataset name to a dataset that is in your LINKLST
   in the following two member BUILDIT and MAILIT then submit each.
   Marked by '<=== Change'.  0 RC expected. F LLA,REFRESH

4. Copy member DSINEX04 into your hlq.CADSJCL modify the CSI, CADSLOAD and
   the target zone.
   Marked by '<=== Change'.  0 RC expected. F LLA,REFRESH and recycle DISPATCH

5. Copy members GSMAIL1I, IEF176I and IEF302A into SYS1.MPF.COMMANDS then issue
   "S MPFLOAD" to load the new members.

6. Add the following 3 lines to you active MPFLSTxx in SYS1.PARMLIB then issue a
   "SET MPF=xx" changing xx to your active MPFLST member suffix.
     GSMAIL1I,SUP(NO),USEREXIT(MPFXTALL)
     IEF176I,SUP(NO),USEREXIT(MPFXTALL)
     IEF302A,SUP(NO),USEREXIT(MPFXTALL)

7. Follow instructions in member RECPMAIL to modify Report Recipient Definitions
   and Recipient Definition for reports you wish emailed.

   That's it now those modified reports will be emailed to the email address
   placed in the Recipient Definition.

   If you want to email from Online Viewing go read member $INSTOLV

$INSTOLV.text:
If you want to email from Online Viewing you will need to do the following:

1. You will need make sure PTF RO69139 is applied in CA-Dispatch.

2. You will need to modify and apply DSINEX07 to turn on feature 59 in
   CA-Dispatch like this:
   FEAT059=Y, REPRINT WITH RECIPIENT DESCRIPTION
   0 RC expected. F LLA,REFRESH and recycle DISPATCH

3. Follow the steps in member OLVSETUP to setup a recipient for email from OLV

$XMITIC.text:
Make XMITIP datasets SYSP.XMITIP.* or change names in MAILIT program.

Change in SYSP.XMITIP.EXEC(XMITIPCU):
       _center_ = "NKAISERA"
                to
       _center_ = "Your.site.com"

       STANDARD_TIME = "PST"
       DAYLIGHT_TIME = "PDT"
                to
       STANDARD_TIME = "EST"
       DAYLIGHT_TIME = "EDT"
                or whatever your timezone is.

BUILDIT.text:
//GSI1   JOB SSC,REGION=0M,MSGCLASS=T,NOTIFY=&SYSUID
//A EXEC ASMACL,
//         COND.L=(4,LT,C)
//C.SYSIN DD *
BUILDIT CSECT
         YREGS
         LR    12,15
         USING BUILDIT,12
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)
         ST    R13,SAVEAREA+4
         LA    R2,SAVEAREA
         ST    R2,8(R13)
         LR    R13,R2
         B     GETPARM                 BRANCH AROUND CONSTANTS
**********************************************************************
*    Copyright (c) 1998-2014 and Written by Glenn Siegel SSC Corp.   *
**********************************************************************
         DC    C' BUILDIT '          Program name identifier
         DC    C'Version 1.00 '      Version
         DC    C'&SYSDATE '          Assembly date
         DC    C'&SYSTIME '          Assembly time
         DC    C'Copyright (c) 1998-2014 '
         DC    C'Glenn Siegel '
         DC    C'SSC Corp. '
         DC    C'GlennSiegel@optonline.net '
GETPARM  L     R4,0(R1)                EXTRACT DEST FROM PARM
         LH    R5,0(R4)
         BCTR  R5,0
         EX    R5,MOVEDEST
*
         OPEN  (XWTRJCL,(OUTPUT))        OPEN SYSIN FOR JCL
*
         MVC   DELDSN,DEFDEST
         MVC   DEFJNAME,DEFDEST
         MVC   DEFDSN,DEFDEST
         MVC   MAILPARM,DEFDEST
         MVC   DEFMAIL,DEFDEST
         PUT   XWTRJCL,JOBCARD
         PUT   XWTRJCL,OUTPUT1
         PUT   XWTRJCL,OUTPUT2
         PUT   XWTRJCL,COMMENT1
         PUT   XWTRJCL,IEFBR
         PUT   XWTRJCL,DELDSN1
         PUT   XWTRJCL,DELDSN2
         PUT   XWTRJCL,COMMENT2
         PUT   XWTRJCL,XWTR1
         PUT   XWTRJCL,XWTR2A
         PUT   XWTRJCL,XWTR2B
         PUT   XWTRJCL,COMMENT3
         PUT   XWTRJCL,FINDMAIL
         PUT   XWTRJCL,FMSYSIN
         PUT   XWTRJCL,FMRDR
         CLOSE (XWTRJCL)
         L     R13,SAVEAREA+4
         SR    R15,R15
         RETURN  (14,12),RC=(15)
*
JOBCARD  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//'
DEFJNAME DC    CL8' '
         DC    C' JOB IT10,CLASS=A,MSGCLASS=M,REGION=0M  '
         DC    CL30' '
*
OUTPUT1  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//OUTJ  OUTPUT DEST=PRT502,JESDS=ALL    '
         DC    CL40' '
*
OUTPUT2  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//OUTM  OUTPUT DEST=PRT502              '
         DC    CL40' '
*
COMMENT1 DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//* DELETE OLD DATASET                  '
         DC    CL40' '
*
IEFBR    DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//IEFBR14  EXEC  PGM=IEFBR14            '
         DC    CL40' '
*
DELDSN1  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//DD1 DD DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE),UNIT=3'
         DC    C'390,SPACE=(TRK,(1,1)),                  '
*
DELDSN2  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//     DSN=SYSP.DISP.RPT.'
DELDSN   DC    CL8' '
         DC    CL7' '
         DC    CL40' '
*
COMMENT2 DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//* XWTR REPORT TO DATASET              '
         DC    CL40' '
*
XWTR1    DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//IEFPROC  EXEC  PGM=IASXWR00,PARM=''P'''
         DC    CL2' '
         DC    CL40' '
*
XWTR2A   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//IEFRDER DD UNIT=3390,LRECL=133,RECFM=F'
         DC    C'B,SPACE=(TRK,(1,150),RLSE),             '
*
XWTR2B   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//     DISP=(,CATLG),DSN=SYSP.DISP.RPT.'
DEFDSN   DC    CL8' '
         DC    CL33' '
*
COMMENT3 DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//* FIND EMAIL IN DATASET THEN SUBMIT EM'
         DC    C'AIL JOB                                 '
*
FINDMAIL DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//MAILIT EXEC PGM=MAILIT,PARM='
MAILPARM DC    CL8' '
         DC    CL42' '
*
FMSYSIN  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//FMAIL DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYSP.DISP.RPT.'
DEFMAIL  DC    CL8' '
         DC    CL34' '
*
FMRDR    DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//FMRDR DD SYSOUT=(A,INTRDR)'
         DC    CL52' '
*
MOVEDEST MVC   DEFDEST(1),2(R4)
DEFDEST  DC    CL8' '
XWTRJCL  DCB   DDNAME=XWTRJCL,DSORG=PS,MACRF=PM,LRECL=80,RECFM=FB,     X
               BLKSIZE=27920,BUFNO=2
SAVEAREA DS    18F
         END   BUILDIT
//L.SYSLMOD DD DSN=SYSP.LINKLIB(BUILDIT),DISP=SHR      <=== Change

IEF176I.text:
**
** IF YOU USE ANY OTHER XWTR'S YOU WILL NEED TO FIGURE OUT HOW NOT TO
** ISSUE THESE COMMANDS FOR THOSE AND HOW ONLY TO ISSUE THESE FOR THIS.
** YOU COULD SEND ME A DETAILED EMAIL AND I COULD FIGURE IT OUT FOR YOU.
** THE COMMENTED LINES BELOW ARE HOW I DID IT FOR ONE CLIENT.
**
*===================================
*IF MSGNE+12 FOR 02 K
*===================================
GET WORD 02
F %,D=%,C=E
P %
ENDGET
*===================================
*ENDIF
*
*IF MSGID+12 FOR 02 K
*P K
*ENDIF
*===================================

MAILIT.text:
//GSI2   JOB SSC,REGION=0M,MSGCLASS=T,NOTIFY=&SYSUID
//A EXEC ASMACL,
//         COND.L=(4,LT,C)
//C.SYSIN DD *
MAILIT   CSECT
         YREGS
         LR    12,15
         USING MAILIT,12
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)
         ST    R13,SAVEAREA+4
         LA    R2,SAVEAREA
         ST    R2,8(R13)
         LR    R13,R2
         B     GETPARM                 BRANCH AROUND CONSTANTS
**********************************************************************
*    Copyright (c) 1998-2014 and Written by Glenn Siegel SSC Corp.   *
**********************************************************************
         DC    C' MAILIT '           Program name identifier
         DC    C'Version 1.00 '      Version
         DC    C'&SYSDATE '          Assembly date
         DC    C'&SYSTIME '          Assembly time
         DC    C'Copyright (c) 1998-2014 '
         DC    C'Glenn Siegel '
         DC    C'SSC Corp. '
         DC    C'GlennSiegel@optonline.net '
GETPARM  L     R4,0(R1)                EXTRACT DEST FROM PARM
         LH    R5,0(R4)                GET LENGTH OF PARM
         BCTR  R5,0
         EX    R5,MOVEDEST
*
         OPEN  (FMAIL,(INPUT))
LOOP     EQU   *
         MVC   INAREA,=CL133' '
         GET   FMAIL,INAREA
         CLC   INAREA(L'RECIP),RECIP
         BNE   LOOP
         MVC   DEFEMAIL,INAREA+16
         CLI   DEFEMAIL,X'40'
         BE    EODAD
         CLOSE (FMAIL)
*
         OPEN  (FMRDR,(OUTPUT))            OPEN OUTPUT FOR JCL
         MVC   DEFSUBJ(8),INAREA+49
         LA    R7,DEFSUBJ                  Load address of rcv field
         LA    R7,1(R5,R7)                 Bump past end of data
         MVC   0(4,R7),=C''' + '
         MVC   DEFFILE(8),DEFDEST
         LA    R7,DEFFILE                  Load address of rcv field
         LA    R7,1(R5,R7)                 Bump past end of data
         MVC   0(4,R7),=C''') +'
         MVC   DEFFILEN(8),INAREA+49
         LA    R7,DEFFILEN                 Load address of rcv field
         LA    R7,1(R5,R7)                 Bump past end of data
         MVC   0(7,R7),=C'.txt) +'
         PUT   FMRDR,JOBCARD
         PUT   FMRDR,COMMENT1
         PUT   FMRDR,OUTPUT1
         PUT   FMRDR,OUTPUT2
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL1
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL2
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL3
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL4
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL5
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL6
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL7
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL8
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL9
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL10
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL11
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL12
         PUT   FMRDR,EMAIL13
         CLOSE (FMRDR)
BYE      EQU   *
         L     R13,SAVEAREA+4
         SR    R15,R15
         RETURN  (14,12),RC=(15)
EODAD    EQU   *
         CLOSE (FMAIL)
         WTO   'GSMAIL2E NO EMAIL ADDRESS FOUND IN REPORT',            X
               DESC=(2),ROUTCDE=(1)
         B     BYE
*
JOBCARD  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//MAILIT '
         DC    C' JOB IT10,CLASS=A,MSGCLASS=M,REGION=0M  '
         DC    CL31' '
*
COMMENT1 DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//* XMITIP EMAIL PROGRAM                '
         DC    CL40' '
*
OUTPUT1  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//OUTJ  OUTPUT DEST=PRT502,JESDS=ALL    '
         DC    CL40' '
*
OUTPUT2  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//OUTM  OUTPUT DEST=PRT502              '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL1   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//EMAIL   EXEC PGM=IKJEFT1B             '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL2   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//STEPLIB  DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYSP.XMITIP.L'
         DC    C'OAD'
         DC    CL37' '
*
EMAIL3   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//SYSEXEC  DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYSP.XMITIP.E'
         DC    C'XEC'
         DC    CL37' '
*
EMAIL4   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=M,OUTPUT=*.OUTM   '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL5   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=M,OUTPUT=*.OUTM   '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL6   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'//SYSTSIN DD   *                        '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL7   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'%XMITIP '
DEFEMAIL DC    CL32' '
         DC    C' + '
         DC    CL37' '
EMAIL8   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'NOMSG +                                 '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL9   DS    0CL80
         DC    C'From Dispatch@NassauCountyNY.gov +      '
         DC    CL40' '
*
EMAIL10  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'Subject '
         DC    C'''Report '
DEFSUBJ  DC    CL64' '
*
EMAIL11  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'FILE (''SYSP.DISP.RPT.'
DEFFILE  DC    CL59' '
*
EMAIL12  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'FILENAME ('
DEFFILEN DC    CL70' '
*
EMAIL13  DS    0CL80
         DC    C'FORMAT *TXT'
         DC    CL69' '
*
INAREA   DC    CL133' '
RECIP    DC    C'EMAIL address = '
*
MOVEDEST MVC   DEFDEST(1),2(R4)
*
DEFDEST  DC    CL8' '
FMRDR    DCB   DDNAME=FMRDR,DSORG=PS,MACRF=PM,LRECL=80,RECFM=FB,       X
               BLKSIZE=27920,BUFNO=2
FMAIL    DCB   DDNAME=FMAIL,DSORG=PS,EODAD=EODAD,MACRF=GM,RECFM=FB,    X
               LRECL=133
SAVEAREA DS    18F
         END   MAILIT
//L.SYSLMOD DD DSN=SYSP.LINKLIB(MAILIT),DISP=SHR       <=== Change

OLVSETUP.text:
How to set a recipient's Userid to be able to email reports from Online Viewing:

1. Change the following in the Sysgen User Recipient Screen VSGMU235:

   Reprint Type (P,O,C) ==> C                 <=== Change reprint type to C
   Printer Id           ==>                   <=== Blank out printerid
   Class, Destination   ==> E  , destid    ,  <=== Change class to E, change or
                                                   add the destid
   Example of VSGMU235 screen:

 VSGMU235------------------- Sysgen User Recipient Screen ---------------------
DC900004 INFORMATION HAS BEEN UPDATED
 COMMAND ==>
 User: userid             Description: Some, Body
 Installation Codes   ==> CARCP,X
 Reprint Definitions:                             Find Command Definitions:
   Reprint Type (P,O,C) ==> C                       Override       ==> N
   Printer Id           ==>                         Max Find Pages ==>
   Class, Destination   ==> E  , destid    ,
   Max Reprint Pages    ==>
   Printer Override     ==> N         Copies Override (0-999,0=NO) ==>   0
    Opt  Recipient         Description
  ADD==>
 ==> _   u recipientid     some description



2. Add the email address to the second line of the Description field in the
   Recipient Definition Screen VRDMU310 to whom you want the reprot emailed to
   up to 32 characters:
   Description ==> USER - Some Body
               ==> somebody@someplace.com     <========== Add email address here

   Example of VRDMU310 screen:

VRDMU310-------------------- Recipient Definition Screen ---------------------

COMMAND ==>                                              DATA CENTER: datacenter
  X1 List Reports      X2 Maildrop      ADD Add Recip    DEL Delete Recip

Recipient ==> U userid

  Maildrop    ==> maildrop

  Phone       ==> xxx-xxxx

  Description ==> USER - Some Body
              ==> somebody@someplace.com

  Charge Code ==>


Change All Of The Reports Being Sent To The Above Recipient To:
  New Recipient ==>



All the user has to do in Online Viewing is place a P next to the report they
 want to email.

OLVSETU2.text:
How to set a recipient's Userid to be able to email reports from Online Viewing
while allowing the user to change their printer this is done instead of OLVSETUP

1. Change the following in the Sysgen User Recipient Screen VSGMU235:

   Printer Override     ==> Y                 <=== Change to Y

   Example of VSGMU235 screen:

 VSGMU235------------------- Sysgen User Recipient Screen ---------------------
DC900004 INFORMATION HAS BEEN UPDATED
 COMMAND ==>
 User: userid             Description: Some, Body
 Installation Codes   ==> CARCP,X
 Reprint Definitions:                             Find Command Definitions:
   Reprint Type (P,O,C) ==> C                       Override       ==> N
   Printer Id           ==> printerid               Max Find Pages ==>
   Class, Destination   ==>    ,           ,
   Max Reprint Pages    ==>
   Printer Override     ==> Y         Copies Override (0-999,0=NO) ==>   0
    Opt  Recipient         Description
  ADD==>
 ==> _   u recipientid     some description



2. Add the email address to the second line of the Description field in the
   Recipient Definition Screen VRDMU310 to whom you want the reprot emailed to
   up to 32 characters:
   Description ==> USER - Some Body
               ==> somebody@someplace.com     <========== Add email address here

   Example of VRDMU310 screen:

VRDMU310-------------------- Recipient Definition Screen ---------------------

COMMAND ==>                                              DATA CENTER: datacenter
  X1 List Reports      X2 Maildrop      ADD Add Recip    DEL Delete Recip

Recipient ==> U userid

  Maildrop    ==> maildrop

  Phone       ==> xxx-xxxx

  Description ==> USER - Some Body
              ==> somebody@someplace.com

  Charge Code ==>


Change All Of The Reports Being Sent To The Above Recipient To:
  New Recipient ==>



3. The user will need to follow the steps in OLVUSER to email a report
   from Online Viewing.

OLVUSER.text:
1. Place an O next to the report you want to email example of VOVMI310 screen:

VOVMI310---Online Viewing Report Selection Screen, Recipient: U userid

COMMAND==>
  X1 PC Rqst Queue    X2 Add PC Upload Rqst
Start Date (mmddyyyy) ==>              End Date (mmddyyyy) ==>

  Opt Report   Jobname  Date       Time     Desc (24 characters)    Typ  Pages
Pages
=> O  reportid jobname  03/26/2014 12:16:35 description                      2
=> _  reportid jobname  03/26/2014 10:45:28 description                      2
=> _  reportid jobname  03/24/2014 17:26:03 description                      2


2. Place a C in Reprint Type
   Place a valid maildrop in the Maildrop field
   Remove printerid from all Printer ==>
   Places an E in the Class field
   Places a destid in the Destination field (you can use the Reportid)
   Hit enter you should see message:
    DC900078 REPORT HAS BEEN PRINTED

   Example of VOVMI330 screen below.
 VOVMI330 ------------ Online Viewing Print Request Screen --------------------
DC900078 REPORT HAS BEEN PRINTED
 COMMAND ==>
    X1 List Printers    X2 List Profiles

 User      : userid
 Recipient : U recp1
 Report    : reportid   Jobname: jobname

 Reprint Type ==> c  P - Use Printer *Printer Definition  <=== Place C in type
                     O - Use Original Rpt/Rcp Definition
                     C - Use Original Rpt/Rcp Defn with Class/Dest Overrides
 Global Print Parameters:
   Profile  ==>
   Maildrop ==> maildropid                                <=== Place maildrop
   Copies   ==>   1

 Reprint Type P Parameters:
   Printer ==>

 Reprint Type C Parameters:
   Class    ==> e       Destination ==> destid    ,       <=== Place E and dest
   Printer  ==>

RECPMAIL.text:
How to set a recipient's report to be emailed:

1. Change the following in the Report Recipient Definition Screen VRDMU130:
   Print (Y/N) ==> Y  Mon=> Y Tues=> Y Wed=> Y Thur=> Y Fri=> Y Sat=> Y Sun=> Y
    Turn on printing by placing a Y in all above.
   Normal Sysout(Y/N) ==> N    <======================== Change to N
   Specific Class     ==> E    <======================== Change to E
   Destination => destid       <======================== Change the destid the
                                         destid can be the same as the reportid

   Example of VRDMU130 screen:

 VRDMU130---------- Report Recipient Definition Screen, Reports ----------------

 COMMAND ==>                                             Data Center: datacenter
 X1 DJDE X2 Def Pages X3 PC Ext X4 Recip Def X5 Copy Recip ADD Recip DEL Recip
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Recipient ==> U userid              1    Report: reportid     Jobname: jobname
   Print (Y/N) ==> Y  Mon=> Y Tues=> Y Wed=> Y Thur=> Y Fri=> Y Sat=> Y Sun=> Y
   Online Viewing (Y/N) ==> Y   PC (Y/N) ==> Y
   Release Flag (N=Normal,B=Before,A=After,T=Both) ==> N Multi Pass (Y/N) ==> N
 Bundle Options (0-64):       Use Dates (MMDDYYYY)
   Maildrop Pages     ==> 0    Start ==>            Due Out Time(HHMM) ==>
   Recipient Pages    ==> 0    End   ==>            VSM Delay in Days  ==>
   Manifest Copies    ==> 0    User  ==>
 Sysout Definitions:
   Normal Sysout(Y/N) ==> N    Repeat     ==>       FCB   ==>  Hold ==> N
   Fiche Class(Y/N)   ==> N    Priority   ==>       Form  ==>
   Specific Class     ==> E    Copies     ==>   1   Writer =>
   Align/Verify (A/V) ==>      Destination => destid  ,
 Printer Options:
   Flash       ==>             Burst (Y/N)==> N    TRC   ==>
   Modify      ==>             Count      ==>      CHARS ==>
   OPTCD (J)   ==>             Copygroups ==>
 AFP Mode:
   Output/IAFP ==>            Page Format ==>           Copygroup ==>



2. Add the email address to the second line of the Description field in the
   Recipient Definition Screen VRDMU310 to whome you want the reprot emailed to
   up to 32 characters:
   Description ==> USER - Some Body
               ==> somebody@someplace.com     <========== Add email address here

   Example of VRDMU310 screen:

VRDMU310-------------------- Recipient Definition Screen ---------------------

COMMAND ==>                                              DATA CENTER: datacenter
  X1 List Reports      X2 Maildrop      ADD Add Recip    DEL Delete Recip

Recipient ==> U userid

  Maildrop    ==> maildrop

  Phone       ==> xxx-xxxx

  Description ==> USER - Some Body
              ==> somebody@someplace.com

  Charge Code ==>


Change All Of The Reports Being Sent To The Above Recipient To:
  New Recipient ==>



3. You may or may not have to remove the DJDE record if it has been previously
   added and you don't want to see this in the emailed report, see below for
   DJDE display and removal:


DJDE display:
DUPLEX=NO,;
COPIES=00001,;
FORMAT=DCDSP1,;
FORMS=NONE,;
COLLATE=NO,;
SHIFT=NO,;
MODIFY=DCDSC1,;
SIDE=(NUFRONT,NOFFSET),;
DATA=(000,150),;
TOF=001,;
BOF=066,;
ASSIGN=(01,04),;
OVERPRINT=PRINT2,;
MARGIN=(001,POS),;
ITEXT=NONE,;
OTEXT=NONE,;
RTEXT=NONE,;
RFORM=NONE,;
END;


Removal of DJDE
   From the report recipients VRDMU130 screen, type X1 in the command line to
   access the VRDMU131 screen. Then type DEL in the command line on the VRDMU131
   screen, hit enter, and then hit enter again to confirm the DELETE of the
   recipient level DJDE record.

Example after accessing the VRDMU131 screen and hitting ENTER the first time:

VRDMU131 -------------------- Xerox DJDE Screen -------------
DC900010 TO CONFIRM DELETE PLEASE PRESS THE ENTER KEY  COMMAND ==> DEL
     X1 DJDE Extension    X2 DJDE Freeform     ADD Add DJDE
--------------------------------------------------------------
 Report: reportid    Jobname: jobname   Recipient: Some Body
 JDE Id  ==> djdeid                Dept   ==>
